bug.author: yzchaogmail
bug.summary: Ask for help: what wrong with my labels
bug.description:
vehicle <denchmark-link:https://github.com/select>@select</denchmark-link> =type:,car,truck,bus,train ~radio=quality:good,bad ~checkbox=parked:false circle radio=color:green,red,blue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Number>@Number</denchmark-link> =radius:0,10,0.1 Error as follow: <denchmark-h:h1>Not Found</denchmark-h>
The requested URL /check/task/9 was not found on this server. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33389121/49498888-80448080-f8a7-11e8-90dd-9e00b05a913d.png></denchmark-link>
Ask for help: what wrong with my labels ? PS:when i modify my labels as follow,task-create success. vehicle <denchmark-link:https://github.com/select>@select</denchmark-link> =type:,car,truck,bus,train

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yzchaogmail>@yzchaogmail</denchmark-link> , Which CVAT version do you use? Development version has the clear message: "Could not create the task. ValueError: labels string is not correct. radius attribute has incorrect type Number." But we have a bug now. "0.1" isn't supported now. It will be fixed.
